Vouch Mobile in Florida: Unlimited Plans on AT&T's Network

Get unlimited talk, text & data in the Sunshine State for just $30/month. No credit check required.

Florida at a Glance

Data from Florida Census Data

Florida welcomes over 1,000 new residents daily, making it America's fastest-growing state. Whether you're a longtime Floridian or just arrived, Vouch Mobile helps you stay connected across the Sunshine State for a fraction of what big carriers charge.

AT&T Network Coverage in Florida

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Florida residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Sunshine State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Florida, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Major Florida Cities We Cover

Vouch Mobile provides excellent coverage in all major Florida metropolitan areas:

Miami

Full 5G coverage throughout Miami-Dade County, from Brickell to the beaches

Orlando

Comprehensive coverage including Walt Disney World and Universal Studios areas

Tampa Bay

Strong coverage across Tampa, St. Petersburg, and Clearwater

Jacksonville

Excellent coverage in Florida's largest city by area

Fort Lauderdale

Full coverage throughout Broward County and the beaches

West Palm Beach

Reliable service throughout Palm Beach County

Why Florida Residents Choose Vouch Mobile

  • Florida's average phone bill of $118/month is above the national average—Vouch cuts that by 75%.
  • Whether you're stuck on I-4, enjoying the beaches, or working in Miami's finance district, you need reliable coverage.
  • No credit check means UCF students, new Florida residents, and seasonal workers can sign up instantly.
  • AT&T's network covers Florida from the Panhandle to the Keys, including comprehensive coverage in tourist destinations.

The Enterprise Florida shows that Florida has a high economic data, making affordable phone service even more valuable.

How to Get Started in Florida

  1. Check Your Phone: Make sure your phone is unlocked and compatible. Learn how to check.
  2. Choose Your Plan: Select our $30/month unlimited plan.
  3. Order Your SIM: Free shipping to any Florida address.
  4. Activate Online: Simple activation takes just minutes. See our switching guide.
  5. Start Saving: Enjoy unlimited service across Florida.

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Florida. AT&T has invested heavily in Florida infrastructure, providing extensive 5G coverage in major metros and reliable LTE from the Panhandle to the Keys.

Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Florida. The average Floridian pays $118/month for phone service, so you could save over $1,056 per year by switching to Vouch.

No credit check required. Whether you're a UF student, a new Florida resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly. We believe everyone deserves affordable wireless.

Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Florida address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

Yes! 5G is available in Miami, Orlando, Tampa, Jacksonville, Fort Lauderdale, West Palm Beach, and many other Florida cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.
